thread.title: Watch: How to Plan a Running Birthday Party
thread.title_full: Watch: How to Plan a Running Birthday Party

title: Watch: How to Plan a Running Birthday Party
text:
Runners’ Stories Super Secret Mystery Meeting Watch: How to Plan a Running Birthday Party If you’re a runner, and you have a party to plan in the future, follow these steps to make it easy and awesome. By Ali Nolan Friday, February 24, 2017, 11:42 am 
There is nothing Ali and Hannah like more than a celebration race. And in this week’s episode, the pair go through what it takes to plan Ali’s birthday. (Because instead of letting her friends relax and drink a beer on the day of her birth, Ali is demanding everyone run a trail race in February called the Ugly Mudder.) But here’s the thing, planning a race party is easier than planning an actual party. You just have to pick the right race, make cat-themed invitations, invite all your friends, run, then use the race’s after-party as your birthday party! Advertisement
